59dee95daf4db7ac5ad4f3073defd66","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7495b011fe84ea411c3a1d7719fde017b1452fd59eedf4bb8b3b35e4027f91af","dweb:/ipfs/QmVq2QSubhz1bQvZUBYoWGu9Sh5KeJLpkgKT6WCYwzwim4"]}},"version":1}

balanceOf(address).details: This balance includes any funds due to the user from market operations, such as fulfilled bids or asks.

params.user: The address of the user whose balance is being queried.

returns._0: The claimable balance of the user.

claimBalance().details: Reverts if the user has no claimable balance.

clearMarket(uint256).details: This function matches orders in price descending order and settles them. Can only be called 1 hour after the market hour.      Anyone can call this function to clear the market. However, the system does not currently reimburse the caller for gas expenses.      It is assumed that the market will either be operated by an entity that requires its operation, or the gas costs will be shared among the participants of the market.

params.hour: The hour for which asks are being retrieved.
params.user: The address of the user whose asks are being retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Ask structs that were placed by the specified user for the specified hour.

params.hour: The hour for which asks are being retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Ask structs for the specified hour.

params.hour: The hour for which bids are being retrieved.
params.user: The address of the user whose bids are being retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Bid structs that were placed by the specified user for the specified hour.

params.hour: The hour for which bids are being retrieved.

returns._0: An array of Bid structs for the specified hour.

params.hour: The hour for which the clearing price is being retrieved.

returns._0: The clearing price for the specified hour.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

placeAsk(uint256,uint256).details: Requires that the ask amount is not zero and can only be placed for future hours not yet cleared.

params.amount: The amount of energy in kWh being offered.
params.hour: The market hour for which the ask is being placed.

placeBid(uint256,uint256).details: Requires that the bid price is above the minimum price and the bid amount is not zero.      Bids can only be placed for future hours not yet cleared.

params.hour: The market hour for which the bid is being placed.

placeMultipleBids(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Calls `placeBid` for each hour in the specified range.

params.amount: The amount of energy in kWh being bid for each hour.
params.beginHour: The starting hour of the range.
params.endHour: The ending hour of the range.

placeMultipleBids(uint256[],uint256).details: Calls `_placeBid` for each hour in the provided array of hours.

params.amount: The amount of energy in kWh being bid for each hour.
params.biddingHours: An array of market hours for which bids are being placed.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the claimable balance of a user.

claimBalance().notice: Allows users to claim any balance available to them from fulfilled bids or asks.

clearMarket(uint256).notice: Clears the market for a specific hour, matching bids and asks based on the determined clearing price.

getAsksByAddress(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves all asks placed by a specific user for a specific hour.

getAsksByHour(uint256).notice: Retrieves all asks placed for a specific hour.

getBidsByAddress(uint256,address).notice: Retrieves all bids placed by a specific user for a specific hour.

getBidsByHour(uint256).notice: Retrieves all bids placed for a specific hour.

getClearingPrice(uint256).notice: Retrieves the clearing price for a specific hour.

placeAsk(uint256,uint256).notice: Places an ask for selling energy in a specific market hour.

placeBid(uint256,uint256).notice: Places a bid for energy in a specific market hour.

placeMultipleBids(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Places multiple bids for energy over a range of market hours.

placeMultipleBids(uint256[],uint256).notice: Places multiple bids for energy in specified market hours.

@notice Allows users to claim any balance available to them from fulfilled bids or asks.
 @dev Reverts if the user has no claimable balance.
